name: Man's Blindness
description:
You are a dog with cataracts and have to rely on your smell and hearing to navigate a creepy abandoned prison. Use your senses to help a prisoner escape.

Made in 1 week for the ZEN JAM #05

Theme: A different view of a game

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump

Credits:

  • Dog's panting sound effect: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/dog-panting-6862/
  • Dog's snout picture: https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.akc.org%2Fexpert-advice%2F...
  • Dog's snout picture: https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Fhospital.vetmed.wsu.edu%2F2022...
  • Pistol: PS1 style handgun by bftd is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.

My first game!
